name: AttachmentType
title: Attachment Type
description: Attachment Type codes for insurance operations.

concept.definition: Marketing or promotional materials describing the insured's business activities or products.
Documentation of professional or trade association memberships relevant to the insured's operations.
Yearly financial and operational summary of the insured organization.
Professional valuation report determining the value of insured property or assets.
Certification that a burglar alarm system is installed and monitored, often required for theft coverage.
Assessment report from a building evaluator regarding property condition and replacement cost.
Worksheet documenting profit margins and financial data used to calculate business interruption coverage amounts.

designation.value: Pertes d'exploitation - Feuille de travail, profits
Pérdida de ganancias - Hoja de trabajo de utilidades

concept.definition: Signed authorization form permitting direct withdrawals from the insured's bank account for premium payments.
Questionnaire detailing blasting operations, safety procedures, and exposure to assess construction or mining risks.
Notice informing the insured of premium amounts due and payment terms.
Temporary agreement providing immediate coverage before the formal policy is issued.
Legal document proving ownership transfer of insured property or equipment.
Corporate or organizational bylaws governing the insured entity's structure and operations.
Notice that a policy or transaction has been finalized or closed.
Detailed investigation findings regarding the circumstances and validity of a claim.
Application form for crime coverage protecting against employee dishonesty and theft.

designation.value: Proposition d'assurance contre le vol et le détournement

concept.definition: Warranty documentation for a Class II rated safe, required for certain theft coverage limits.

designation.value: Garantía de caja fuerte Clase II

concept.definition: Industry publications or articles about the insured's business sector or market.
Application form for D&O liability coverage protecting corporate directors and officers from legal claims.

designation.value: Solicitud de seguro para directores y funcionarios

concept.definition: Specialized application form for daycare facility coverage.
Application for 3-D coverage protecting against employee dishonesty, mysterious disappearance, and property destruction.

designation.value: Assurance 3 D (contre les détournements, la disparition et la destruction) - formule générale
Seguro integral contra deshonestidad, desaparición y destrucción

concept.definition: Summary page listing the insured, coverages, limits, premiums, and effective dates of the policy.
Copy of driver's licence for all operators of insured vehicles.
Complete list of all drivers who will operate insured vehicles.
Proof of completed driver training, which may qualify for premium discounts.
Application for professional liability coverage protecting against negligence claims in professional services.

designation.value: Solicitud de seguro de errores y omisiones

concept.definition: Documentation regarding electronic data assets, storage systems, and backup procedures.
Signed authorization for automatic premium payments via electronic bank transfer.

designation.value: Formulario firmado de transferencia electrónica de fondos

concept.definition: Technical assessment report on equipment, structures, or systems being insured.
Form requesting a property or risk evaluation by the insurer.
Copy of the current policy that is expiring and being replaced or renewed.
Final billing statement for a cancelled or non-renewed policy.
Notice specifying the degree of fault assigned to each party in an auto accident claim.

designation.value: Avis de détermination de la responsabilité

concept.definition: Application for fidelity bond coverage protecting against employee theft and dishonesty.
Government regulations or legislative documents relevant to the insured's operations or industry.
Financial statements showing the insured's assets, liabilities, income, and expenses.
Report documenting property condition, hazards, and risk factors from a physical inspection.
Statement of account balances, premium payments, and transaction history.
Mid-term report on organizational changes, structure, or operations that may affect coverage.
Written authorization to release information, make changes, or take actions on behalf of the insured.
Letter from a previous insurer documenting the insured's claims history and coverage experience.
Detailed record of past claims, losses, and their outcomes over a specified period.
Application form for general liability coverage.

designation.value: Solicitud de seguro de responsabilidad civil

concept.definition: Certificate of liability provided to third parties as proof of coverage.
Medical documentation related to bodily injury claims.
Specialized application form for municipal government coverage.
Official driving record showing licence status, violations, and accident history.
Organization's mission and vision statements describing its purpose and goals.
News article about the insured or relevant to the risk being assessed.
Declaration that the insured or household members are non-smokers, which may qualify for discounts.
Notice that a new policy or transaction has been initiated.
Notice that a premium payment is past due and may result in policy cancellation.
Questionnaire detailing heating oil tank type, age, and location to assess environmental risk.
Documentation proving ownership of insured property or business.
Photographs of insured property, damage, or operations for documentation purposes.
Ongoing record of pollution exposures, containment measures, and environmental compliance.
Receipts or invoices proving the purchase and value of insured items.
Documentation of previous policies and coverage history.
Inspection report completed before policy inception to assess risk and establish baseline conditions.
Reminder notice that a premium payment is due soon.
Assessment of product safety procedures, testing, and quality control measures.

designation.value: Sondage sur la sécurité d'un produit

concept.definition: Questionnaire detailing products manufactured or sold to assess product liability exposure.
Documentation of quality control processes and standards used in the insured's operations.

designation.value: Procédure de contrôle de la qualité

concept.definition: Worksheet calculating the replacement cost of buildings or property to determine appropriate coverage limits.

designation.value: Feuille(s) de travail - Valeur à neuf
Hoja(s) de trabajo de costo de reemplazo

concept.definition: Declaration that the insured is retired and qualifies for a retiree discount.

designation.value: Déclaration - Formulaire de rabais pour les retraités
Declaración de formulario de descuento para jubilados

concept.definition: Notice that a premium refund has been issued to the insured.
Notice regarding rental vehicle arrangements during auto claim processing.
Document releasing a lender's or lienholder's interest in insured property.
Notice that a payment was returned or rejected by the bank.
Academic transcript used to verify eligibility for student discounts.
Application form to renew an expiring policy with updated information.
Certification of safety compliance for equipment, vehicles, or facilities.
Questionnaire about sewer backup protection systems and drainage to assess water damage risk.
Detailed schedule listing specific items, values, or coverages under the policy.
Layout or floor plan of the insured premises showing structures and features.
Specialized application form for ski resort operations coverage.

designation.value: Proposition d'assurance pour les stations de ski
Solicitud de seguro para estación de esquí

concept.definition: Assessment of premises hazards that could result in liability claims.

designation.value: Evaluación de riesgos de responsabilidad civil

concept.definition: Questionnaire about wood stoves or solid fuel heating systems to assess fire risk.

designation.value: Questionnaire sur le chauffage à combustible solide
Cuestionario de calefacción de combustible sólido

concept.definition: Detailed listing of property values by location or type used to determine coverage limits.

designation.value: État des valeurs (déclaration des existences) OQLF

concept.definition: Service or maintenance contract for equipment or systems being insured.
Notice that insured property has been declared a total loss in a claim.
Industry publication relevant to the insured's business sector.
Legal document establishing a trust arrangement involving insured property or interests.
Application for umbrella or excess liability coverage above underlying policy limits.
Voided cheque providing banking details for direct deposit or automatic payments.
Notice that a policy or application has been withdrawn.
Notice that a requested policy withdrawal has been rejected.
Application for owner-controlled or contractor-controlled program covering all contractors on a project.

designation.value: Proposition d'assurance responsabilité civile globale de chantier
Solicitud de seguro integral de obra

concept.definition: Electronic notice that the credit card on file for premium payments has expired.

designation.value: eDoc Expiration de la carte de crédit utilisée pour effectuer les paiements
eDoc Tarjeta de crédito de facturación vencida

concept.definition: Electronic notice that an outstanding premium balance has been sent to collections.
Electronic final billing statement for a policy.
Electronic notice requiring payment of an outstanding balance to maintain coverage.

designation.value: eDoc Paiement du solde impayé requis

concept.definition: Electronic notice that a premium payment is overdue.

concept.display: eDoc Payment Received and Policy Reinstated
concept.definition: Electronic confirmation that payment was received and a lapsed policy has been reinstated.

designation.value: eDoc Paiement reçu et police remise en vigueur
eDoc Pago recibido y póliza restablecida

concept.definition: Electronic notice that a premium refund has been issued.
Electronic notice that a bank withdrawal for premium payment was rejected.

designation.value: eDoc Avis de refus du retrait de la facturation
eDoc Aviso de rechazo de retiro de facturación

concept.definition: Electronic notice that a claims adjuster has been assigned to handle the claim.

designation.value: eDoc Affectation d'un expert en sinistres
eDoc Asignación de ajustador de reclamos

concept.definition: Electronic notice that a claim file has been closed.

designation.value: eDoc Avis de fermeture d'une demande de règlement
eDoc Aviso de cierre de reclamo

concept.display: eDoc Claim Auto Fault Determination Notice
concept.definition: Electronic notice specifying fault determination for an auto accident claim.

designation.value: eDoc Avis de détermination de la responsabilité du sinistre automobile
eDoc Aviso de determinación de culpa de reclamo de auto

concept.definition: Electronic notice that a new claim has been opened and registered.

designation.value: eDoc Avis d'ouverture d'une demande de règlement
eDoc Aviso de apertura de reclamo

concept.definition: Electronic notice that a claim payment has been issued.

designation.value: eDoc Avis de paiement à la suite d'une réclamation
eDoc Aviso de pago de reclamo

concept.definition: Electronic notice regarding rental vehicle arrangements during claim processing.

designation.value: eDoc Avis de location de voiture
eDoc Aviso de alquiler de auto por reclamo

concept.definition: Electronic notice that a vehicle or property has been declared a total loss.

designation.value: eDoc Aviso de pérdida total de reclamo

concept.definition: Electronic policy declaration page for a newly issued policy.

designation.value: eDoc Conditions particulières d'une nouvelle police d'assurance des entreprises
eDoc Declaración de póliza de nuevo negocio

concept.definition: Electronic liability certificates issued with a new policy.

designation.value: eDoc Certificats d'assurance responsabilité liés à une nouvelle police d'assurance des entreprises
eDoc Certificados de responsabilidad civil de nuevo negocio

concept.definition: Electronic payment schedule for a newly issued policy.

designation.value: eDoc Calendrier des paiements joint à une nouvelle police d'assurance des entreprises
eDoc Calendario de pagos de nuevo negocio

concept.display: eDoc Payment Schedule No Policy Transaction
concept.definition: Electronic payment schedule issued independently, not linked to a specific policy transaction.

designation.value: eDoc Calendrier des paiements non joint à une opération sur police
eDoc Calendario de pagos sin transacción de póliza

concept.definition: Electronic updated policy declaration page reflecting mid-term policy changes.

designation.value: eDoc Conditions particulières liées à une modification de police
eDoc Declaración de póliza de cambio de póliza

concept.definition: Electronic liability certificates updated to reflect policy changes.

designation.value: eDoc Certificats d'assurance responsabilité liés à une police modifiée
eDoc Certificados de responsabilidad civil de cambio de póliza

concept.definition: Electronic revised payment schedule resulting from policy changes.

designation.value: eDoc Calendrier des paiements joint à une police modifiée
eDoc Calendario de pagos de cambio de póliza

concept.definition: Electronic policy declaration page for a renewed policy.

designation.value: eDoc Conditions particulières liées à une police renouvelée
eDoc Declaración de póliza de renovación

concept.definition: Electronic liability certificates issued with policy renewal.

designation.value: eDoc Certificats d'assurance responsabilité liés à une police renouvelée
eDoc Certificados de responsabilidad civil de renovación

concept.definition: Electronic payment schedule for a renewed policy term.

designation.value: eDoc Calendrier des paiements joint à une police renouvelée
eDoc Calendario de pagos de renovación

concept.definition: Electronic policy declaration page for a reinstated policy after lapse.

designation.value: eDoc Conditions particulières liées à une police remise en vigueur
eDoc Declaración de póliza de restablecimiento

concept.definition: Electronic liability certificates issued upon policy reinstatement.

designation.value: eDoc Certificats d'assurance responsabilité liés à une police remise en vigueur
eDoc Certificados de responsabilidad civil de restablecimiento

concept.definition: Electronic payment schedule for a reinstated policy.

designation.value: eDoc Calendrier des paiements joint à une police remise en vigueur
eDoc Calendario de pagos de restablecimiento

concept.definition: Electronic policy declaration page for a rewritten policy replacing an existing one.

designation.value: eDoc Conditions particulières liées à une police révisée
eDoc Declaración de póliza de reescritura

concept.definition: Electronic liability certificates issued with a rewritten policy.

designation.value: eDoc Certificats d'assurance responsabilité liés à une police révisée
eDoc Certificados de responsabilidad civil de reescritura

concept.definition: Electronic payment schedule for a rewritten policy.

designation.value: eDoc Calendrier des paiements joint à une police révisée
eDoc Calendario de pagos de reescritura

concept.definition: Electronic policy declaration page reissued to correct errors or update information.

designation.value: eDoc Conditions particulières liées à une police réémise
eDoc Declaración de póliza de reemisión

concept.definition: Electronic liability certificates reissued with corrected information.

designation.value: eDoc Certificats d'assurance responsabilité liés à une police réémise
eDoc Certificados de responsabilidad civil de reemisión

concept.definition: Electronic payment schedule reissued to correct errors or update payment information.

designation.value: eDoc Calendrier des paiements joint à une police réémise
eDoc Calendario de pagos de reemisión

concept.definition: Electronic request for additional information or documentation needed for underwriting review.
Electronic notice that the insurer has cancelled the policy.

concept.display: eDoc Insurer Cancellation with No Option to Reinstate
concept.definition: Electronic notice of insurer-initiated cancellation with no reinstatement option allowed.

designation.value: eDoc Annulation par l'assureur sans possibilité de remise en vigueur
eDoc Cancelación por aseguradora sin opción de restablecimiento

concept.display: eDoc Insurer Cancellation with Option to Reinstate
concept.definition: Electronic notice of insurer-initiated cancellation with option to reinstate if conditions are met.

designation.value: eDoc Annulation par l'assureur avec possibilité de remise en vigueur
eDoc Cancelación por aseguradora con opción de restablecimiento

concept.definition: Electronic confirmation that the insured has requested policy cancellation.

designation.value: eDoc Solicitud de cancelación por asegurado

concept.definition: Electronic notice that the insurer will not renew the policy at expiration.
The complete policy document including terms, conditions, exclusions, and coverage details.
Document certifying that coverage is in force, typically provided to third parties.
Detailed report of all claims history over a specified period, including paid and reserved amounts.
Amendment to the policy modifying coverage, terms, or conditions.
Formal notice that a policy has been or will be cancelled.
Completed form reporting a claim and providing initial loss details.
Detailed estimate of costs to repair damaged property or vehicles.
Legal document authorizing someone to act on behalf of the insured.
